doc:
Peggy Miley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Miley 0 Peggy Miley is an American actress and writer. She has played supporting roles in films such as Alice, The Little Princess, Bandits, The Back-up Plan, and Primary Colors. She is also known for her work in commercials, including a Christmas television ad for Cheerios in which she played the grandmother. Peggy_Miley is an_American_actress_and_writer . She has_played_supporting roles in films such_as Alice , The_Little_Princess , Bandits , The_Back-up_Plan , and Primary_Colors . She is_also_known for her_work in commercials , including a_Christmas_television_ad for Cheerios in which she played the_grandmother .
